Package mastodon.core

Class Summary
Algorithm This is the general layout that a pruning Algorithm has to follow.
Arguments  
Arguments.IntegerArrayOption  
Arguments.IntegerOption  
Arguments.Option  
Arguments.RealArrayOption  
Arguments.RealOption  
Arguments.StringOption  
BitTree This class implements a BitSet implementation of a tree.
BitTreeSystem This class contains methods for the manipulation of Trees using BitSets.
Clade This object represents a tree clade using bitsets.
NexusWriter This class uses JEBL's NexusExporter to write tree objects to file.
RunResult An object that contains all relevant information about the results of a pruning algorithm run: pruning count upper and lower limits, the BitTreeSystem the run was carried out on, map of pruning frequencies of individual taxa, name of run, Lists (entry for each pruning set that resulted in the same MAP score) of pruned taxa as Taxon objects or BitSet, score ({MAP score, number of matching trees}) and the MAP tree with pruned nodes annotated.
TreeReader This class uses NexusImporter and NewickImporter to read in Tree objects from NEXUS or Newick files.
 

Exception Summary
Arguments.ArgumentException
